arts.ttl: Nahki Wells has Robins back on song with quickfire second-half double at Stoke
arts.sum: Lewis Koumas and Andrew Moran had put the Potters 2-0 up inside the opening quarter-of-an-hour before the Robins fought back

arts.ttl: Stoke City fans beware as A50 still shut and A500 queues
arts.sum: It comes as the eastbound A50 - at the Meir Tunnel - has been shut since 3.17pm this afternoon for repairs to a 'collapsed manhole'. A section of the Stoke-on-Trent A50 remains shut tonight - as Stoke City prepare to play at the bet365 Stadium.

arts.ttl: Fly high Theo Manning: Bristol City family were at their best on emotional day at Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Just how Chris Hogg and the players were able to train and put plans in place for the away game at Middlesbrough when I’m sure all their thoughts were with their gaffer and his family is testament to their professionalism. I have massive respect for the Middlesbrough fans, their football club and their manager and it was lovely to see the programme notes from Michael Carrick, speaking about the situation and how they wanted to support Liam, the two having done their coaching badges together.

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Bristol City live match updates and team news
arts.sum: Three points separate the two teams before this round of mid-week fixtures, with Stoke next in action after this at Sheffield United on Saturday, while Bristol City return to Ashton Gate to take on Leeds United. Stoke City host Bristol City in the Championship as they try to keep making strides forward under new head coach Narcis Pelach.

arts.ttl: Tough love for Viktor Johansson as Stoke City goalkeeper sent clear message
arts.sum: Not surprisingly, supporters who responded to our poll believed goalkeeper to be the position least in need of attention come the January window with 54% believing it is the strongest area of the team, followed by midfield and the wings (both 16%) and at centre-forward (9%). And Johansson was centre-stage in a poll of supporters to gauge Stoke’s progress so far this season, with a cool 81% or respondents proclaiming him the summer signing to have impressed them most, way ahead of Sam Gallagher (13%) and defender Ben Gibson and Eric Bocat (both on 3%).

arts.ttl: Aaron Ramsey makes career admission as he rakes over leg break horror at Stoke City
arts.sum: “But I did have some really good people around me at the time and a lot of messages from people who had suffered similar injuries - I had a double leg break, fib and tib. “But definitely after that I think it's probably had a bit [of an impact] and obviously I’ve still got the metal in my leg as well, and that can have an effect on the body.

arts.ttl: Stoke City players told to improve fitness as Narcis Pelach makes 'through the roof' claim
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach intends to steadily improve the fitness levels of his inherited Stoke City squad in the coming weeks and months in order to ensure the players are fully capable of carrying out exactly what his approach to matches demands. "I respect all of the coaches, we play in a different way, we do different things depending on our backgrounds and the way we feel the game.
